property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Alaborn Cavalier attacks, you may tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Course he ran! I wouldn't want to stare down that barrel, either!"—Alaborn soldier

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Armillary Sphere: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mysterious purpose of two of the rings had eluded Esper mages—until now.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {2}{W} (You may pay an additional {2}{W} as you cast this spell.) If Benalish Lancer was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with first strike.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Red creatures you control have first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Boggarts divide the world into two categories: things you can eat, and things you have to chase down and pummel before you can eat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying When Bogardan Hellkite enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Bogardan Rager enters the battlefield, target creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the erupting heart of Bogardan, it's hard to tell hurtling volcanic rocks from pouncing volcanic beasts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.) Breath of Darigaaz deals 1 damage to each creature without flying and each player. If Breath of Darigaaz was kicked, it deals 4 damage to each creature without flying and each player instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Kills and cooks your food in one easy stroke."

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Level up {2} ({2}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-4 2/2
LEVEL 5+ 5/5 First strike

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) When Cinder Wall blocks, destroy it at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The smell of roasted flesh hung over the valley for hours."—Onean sergeant

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 for each Mountain you control and has first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Swords may sunder. Shields may fail. My will is stronger than steel, and my flesh and bone far more deadly."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cone of Flame deals 1 damage to target creature or player, 2 damage to another target creature or player, and 3 damage to a third target creature or player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblins journey to the sacrificial peaks in pairs so that the rare survivor might be able to relate the details of the other's grisly demise.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {R}: Dragon Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If this ability has been activated four or more times this turn, sacrifice Dragon Whelp at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though no longer attached to the hand, it still holds its adversary in its grasp.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dragon spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We speak the dragons' language of flame and rage. They speak our language of fury and honor. Together we shall weave a tale of destruction without equal."

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you control four or fewer lands, search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. Cycling—Sacrifice a land. (Sacrifice a land, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "At harvest are seeds of next year sown."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fiery Fall deals 5 damage to target creature. Basic landcycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.) {R}: Fire-Belly Changeling gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than twice each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My ears say it hisses. My fingers say it burns."—Auntie Wort

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ghostfire is colorless. Ghostfire deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only those gifted with the eye of Ugin, the spirit dragon, can see his fiery breath.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Grasslands enters the battlefield tapped. {T}, Sacrifice Grasslands: Search your library for a Forest or Plains card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying. When enchanted creature dies, put a 2/2 white Griffin creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The next 2 damage that a source of your choice would deal to you and/or permanents you control this turn is dealt to target creature or player instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even when fate is already written, there's always time to change the names.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}: Henge Guardian gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like so many Thran relics, the wurm engine kept operating long after its creators were gone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You helped save my people from a Phyrexian fate. Did you think I wouldn't return the favor?"—Eladamri, to Gerrard

property.name: Rules
property.value: Jaws of Stone deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players, where X is the number of Mountains you control as you cast Jaws of Stone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When giants find their mountain homes infested, they have a whole range of solutions.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature and a +1/+1 counter on Juniper Order Ranger.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To protect the alliance between Kjeldor and Yavimaya, they trained in the ways of both.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Level up {2}{W} ({2}{W}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 2-4 3/6 Other creatures you control get +1/+1. LEVEL 5+ 4/8 Other creatures you control get +2/+2.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Amplify 3 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put three +1/+1 counters on it for each Dragon card you reveal in your hand.) Flying {T}: Kilnmouth Dragon deals damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it to target creature or player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Knight creatures you control have double strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ambidexterity is common among kithkin. The thoughtweft links the minds of the left- and right-handed, giving each the knack of the other.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Other Knight creatures you control get +1/+1 and are indestructible. (Lethal damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you think you are brave enough to walk the path of honor, follow me into the dragon's den."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Level up {3} ({3}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-3 2/3 Flying LEVEL 4+ 4/4 Flying, vigilance

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "By tradition, we don't speak for two days after battle. If our deeds won't speak for themselves, what else could be said?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Knight of the Reliquary gets +1/+1 for each land card in your graveyard. {T}, Sacrifice a Forest or Plains: Search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike When Knight of the White Orchid enters the battlefield, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Both guide and guard on open plain.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Knotvine Paladin attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each untapped creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He is part of a new breed of guardian, one who embraces the best of both his world and ours."—Mayael the Anima

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The skyhunters were born when the first leonin gazed at the heavens and wished to hunt the birds overhead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance {4}{W}: Lionheart Maverick gets +1/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your signet is no symbol of power. It marks only your need for numbers to aid you. What do you do, guild-rat, now that you face my blade alone?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +3/+0 and has trample and lifelink. (If the creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker. Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.) Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tusks to splinter skulls. Steel to shatter scale."—Warhammer inscription

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The southern fortress taken by invaders? Heh, sure . . . when elephants fly."—Brezard Skeinbow, captain of the guard

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {1}{R}: Mordant Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Whenever Mordant Dragon deals combat damage to a player, you may have it deal that much damage to target creature that player controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Mudbutton Torchrunner dies, it deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The oil sloshes against his skull as he nears his destination: the Frogtosser Games and the lighting of the Flaming Boggart.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent. When Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Paladin of Prahv deals damage, you gain that much life. Forecast — {1}{W}, Reveal Paladin of Prahv from your hand: Whenever target creature deals damage this turn, you gain that much life. (Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The knights are a major attraction at every Lammastide festival. Teams of riders perform daring feats of flight to the delight of all below.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Punishing Fire deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Whenever an opponent gains life, you may pay {R}. If you do, return Punishing Fire from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature that dealt damage to you this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just as the noble soul calls virtue to itself, the evil soul summons harm."—Teachings of Eight-and-a-Half-Tails

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If your flesh can withstand the flame, the spirit of the dragon will burn within your soul.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Seismic Strike deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life up here is simple. Adapt to the ways of the mountains and they will reward you. Fight them and they will end you."—Kezim, prodigal pyromancer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sejiri Steppe enters the battlefield tapped. When Sejiri Steppe enters the battlefield, target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Selesnya Sanctuary enters the battlefield tapped. When Selesnya Sanctuary enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {G}{W} to your mana pool.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {1}{R}: Shivan Hellkite deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A dragon's scale can be carved into a mighty shield, provided you can procure a dragontooth to cut it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying. {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, target creature you control gets +3/+3 and other creatures you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For unwavering commitment and unflinching strength, the Order of the White Orchid confers its sigil. Rise, knight-captain, and do your duty."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hammer out your doubts as you forge your weapon. To slay a dragon, your resolve must be stronger than your steel."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a Goblin: Add {R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I like goblins. They make funny little popping sounds when they die."—Braids, dementia summoner

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, first strike (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach, and it deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We leonin have come to rule the plains by taking to the skies."—Raksha Golden Cub

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +0/+1 and have reach. (They can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It hardly weighs anything, but it takes all day to remove.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Within each of you is the strength of a landslide."—Kumano, to his pupils

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Knight-stewards guard the Sun-Dappled Court, a grove of immense, sculptured olive trees that represent Valeron's twelve noble families.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Untap target creature with power less than the number of cards in your graveyard and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn, and put a +1/+1 counter on that creature for each 1 damage prevented this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who survive the test bear a mark of power anyone can recognize.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Thunder Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to each creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes primitive cultures attributed natural phenomena to monsters. Sometimes they were right.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Treetop Village enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. {1}{G}: Treetop Village becomes a 3/3 green Ape creature with trample until end of turn. It's still a land. (If it would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Devour 1 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with that many +1/+1 counters on it.) When Voracious Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target creature or player equal to twice the number of Goblins it devoured.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Protection from black (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Out of the blackness and stench of the engulfing swamp emerged a shimmering figure. Only the splattered armor and ichor-stained sword hinted at the unfathomable evil the knight had just laid waste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every elf in Shadowmoor is charged from birth with a terrible duty: to strike back against the ugliness and darkness, even though they are all around and seemingly without end.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.) {1}{W}{W}: Target Knight creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Command is the act of balancing on a vine and convincing others that it is firm ground."—Sidar Jabari
